SELECT average(`provider.memoryUtilization.Average`) as 'Memory Average utilization (%)', average(`provider.memoryUtilization.Maximum`) as 'Memory Maximum utilization (%)', average(`provider.memoryUtilization.Minimum`) as 'Memory Minimum utilization (%)' FROM ComputeSample WHERE (provider='EcsService' AND provider.serviceName LIKE '%au-producer-ms%' AND entityName LIKE '%mte-a%') TIMESERIES auto

SELECT average(`provider.cpuUtilization.Average`) as 'CPU Average utilization (%)', average(`provider.cpuUtilization.Maximum`) as 'CPU Maximum utilization (%)', average(`provider.cpuUtilization.Minimum`) as 'CPU Minimum utilization (%)'  FROM ComputeSample WHERE (provider='EcsService' AND provider.serviceName LIKE '%au-producer-ms%' AND entityName LIKE '%mte-a%') TIMESERIES auto

SELECT sum(`provider.httpCodeElb5XXCount.Sum`) as '5xx errors', sum(`provider.httpCodeElb4XXCount.Sum`) as '4xx errors' FROM LoadBalancerSample WHERE provider='Alb' AND entityName LIKE '%mte-au-producer-ms%' TIMESERIES auto
SELECT sum(`provider.requestCount.Sum`) as 'Requests' FROM LoadBalancerSample WHERE provider='Alb' AND entityName LIKE '%mte-au-producer-ms%' TIMESERIES auto

SELECT sum(`provider.activeConnectionCount.Sum`) as 'Active connections', sum(`provider.newConnectionCount.Sum`) as 'New connections', sum(`provider.rejectedConnectionCount.Sum`) as 'Rejected connections' FROM LoadBalancerSample WHERE provider='Alb' AND entityName LIKE '%mte-au-producer-ms%' TIMESERIES auto
